Name: Music Racer 2000
About the game: You can play any music files (MP3, Ogg, Flac, Wav) stored on your hard drive or use music from AUDIUS STREAMING or IN-GAME LIBRARY. This game takes your favorite song and generates a racing track based on it, so you can literally RACE YOUR MUSIC! The shape, speed, and mood of each ride are determined by the song you choose.
